articles.author: James Felton
articles.title: 'Very Unusual' Rise In Cases Of Severe Liver Damage Seen In Children Across UK, US, and Europe - IFLScience
articles.description: An unusual rise in liver damage cases in children has been seen in the UK, US and Europe, prompting the World Health Organization (WHO) to closely monitor
articles.content:
An unusual rise in liver damage cases in children has been seen in the UK, US and Europe, prompting the World Health Organization (WHO) to closely monitor the situation.
